meanings: pocket money, allowance, spending money, (inf) pin money
give spending money to one's parents

examples.korean: The crafty production has cheated teenagers out of their pocket money with its low quality teensploitation movies. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 술수가 뛰어난 영화 제작사가 십대 취향의 질 낮은 영화로 그들의 용돈을 갈취해 왔다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
